# NSHostByteOrder()

**Function**

Returns the endian format.

## Declaration

```swift
func NSHostByteOrder() -> Int
```

## Return Value

The endian format, either [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NS_LittleEndian] or [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NS_BigEndian].

## Functions

- **NSConvertHostDoubleToSwapped(_:)**: Performs a type conversion.
- **NSConvertHostFloatToSwapped(_:)**: Performs a type conversion.
- **NSConvertSwappedDoubleToHost(_:)**: Performs a type conversion.
- **NSConvertSwappedFloatToHost(_:)**: Performs a type conversion.
- **NSSwapBigDoubleToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapBigFloatToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapBigIntToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapBigLongLongToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapBigLongToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapBigShortToHost(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapDouble(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapFloat(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapHostDoubleToBig(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapHostDoubleToLittle(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
- **NSSwapHostFloatToBig(_:)**: Swaps the bytes of a number.
